property.name: tuner.root.directory
property.description: Root directory of SparkTuner. (default: location of EnvironmentParser.py)

property.name: tuner.yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address
property.description: The webApp address of yarn resourcemanager. (default: "yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address")

property.name: tuner.application.jar.mainClass
property.description: The main class of client's business application jar.

property.name: tuner.application.jar.location
property.description: The location of client's business application jar.

property.name: tuner.sample.scale
property.description: The number of samples in the training set. (default: 200)

property.name: tuner.scheduler.numWorkers
property.description: The number of worker nodes. (default: num of yarn slaves)

property.name: tuner.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb
property.description: The maximum memory that can be allocated to a single executor. (default: value of "yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb")

property.name: tuner.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb
property.description: The minimum memory that should be allocated to a single executor. (default: value of "yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb")

property.name: tuner.scheduler.maximum-allocation-vcores
property.description: The maximum cpu cores that can be allocated to a single executor. (default: value of "yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-vcores")

property.name: tuner.scheduler.minimum-allocation-vcores
property.description: The minimum cpu cores that should be allocated to a single executor. (default: value of "yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-vcores")

property.name: tuner.node.available.memory
property.description: The maximum available memory of a single worker node. (default: value of "yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb")

property.name: tuner.node.available.vcores
property.description: The maximum available cpu cores of a single worker node. (default: value of "yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores")

property.name: tuner.iteration.num
property.description: The number of the search iterations.(default: 60)

property.name: tuner.enable.sparkStreamingTuner
property.description: Whether to enable SparkStreamingTuning. Only support for Hibench-SparkStreamingTests now. (default: False)

property.name: tuner.enable.defaltConfiguration
property.description: Whether to use the official default parameters to run the application. (default: False)

property.name: tuner.skip.dataCollection
property.description: Whether to skip sampling data collection. (default: False)
